summary: Provides augmentation tools for the Imagen multimodal dataset, including loading and tensorizing pre‑computed feature encodings with padding, resizing, and validity mask generation, as well as creating clean multi‑resolution image pyramids for downstream multimodal pipelines.
business_intent: Enable reliable preprocessing of multimodal data to support training and evaluation of large‑scale generative models by delivering consistent feature alignment and multi‑scale image inputs without corruption.
